title: Add Section to Section Request
description: Schema for adding a child section to a parent section

childSectionId.description: The ID of the child section to add.

position.description: The position of the child section within the parent. If null, it will be added at the end.

oldParentSectionId.description: The ID of the old parent section to remove the relationship from (optional).

oldParentPageId.description: The ID of the old parent page to remove the relationship from (optional).
